name: Platformer Game (SadShane)
description:
3D Platformer game using Unreal Engine 4 and 'Hour of code' starter files and assets.

This project was for my SGD102 - Programming class to learn coding in C++ as well as how it integrates with Unreal Engine.

It is a 3D Platformer where you must jump between islands, collect coins and gems while avoiding spinning lasers and falling off the level.

Be careful, if you die from touching a laser or falling you lose a coin!

Use the jump boosts, find the key, unlock the door, and make it to the end goal with as many coins as you can to WIN!

Movement:

Forward, Back, Left, RightW, S, A, DJumpSPACEBARUseEQuit GameALT + F4
